last_episode_to_air.name: Today's Main Race! The Gilded Vessel Obstacle Course (G1)
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's the final race of the season, as a group of horse girls take on a deviously designed obstacle course.

name: Umayon
overview: The horse girls are back to charm you in this special, bite-size anime. Umayon comes alive as a cute and eye-catching anime! At a school-turned-training facility, the girls will race, perform, and train... but that's not all! Saddle up for a short-form anime that displays the laidback school days of the horse girls! Aaaaand, they're off!

episodes.name: 40% And Below! Tracen Academy Special Make-up Exams
episodes.overview: The girls from Umamusume: Pretty Derby are back with a series of short adventures exploring their campus life. In this episode, Special Week is taking a strangely competitive makeup exam.

episodes.name: Newly Filmed! The Tracen Academy Video Introduction
episodes.overview: Symboli Rudolf, Tokai Teio, and Air Groove review a video package meant to introduce people to the world of Tracen Academy.

episodes.name: The World You've Dreamed of Is Right in Front of You
episodes.overview: Yukino Bijin and Mayano Top Gun are dazzled by Golden City's modeling work. But then City herself decides to show them that it's not as far beyond their reach as they're imagining.

episodes.name: The Opera: “Alas, It Is My Fate”
episodes.overview: The curtain rises on a theatrical extravaganza as T.M. Opera O takes to the stage!

episodes.name: A Major Clash?! The Ramen Cup (GII)
episodes.overview: The Horse Girls are off to the races once again, this time competing to see who can scarf down a mega-sized bowl of ramen first.

episodes.name: An Elegant Lunch for Elegant Young Ladies
episodes.overview: A group of Tracen Academy's high society horse girls take a trip to a beef bowl restaurant for a more casual dining experience.

episodes.name: Time to Hunt Rhinoceros Beetles! BNW
episodes.overview: While at a training camp, Winning Ticket convinces Biwa Hayahide and Narita Taishin to help her track down some beetles for local kids.

episodes.name: Hero Theater: Uma Soldier V!!
episodes.overview: The forces of evil are on the rise and it's up to the courageous horse girl warriors of Uma Soldier V to save the day!

episodes.name: Make the Dream Come True! Getaway Sisters
You Get Spooked, You Lose! Test of Courage Showdown!
episodes.overview: Vodka and Daiwa Scarlet try to see who scares more easily, but if they're not careful, they both might end up getting the shock of a lifetime.

episodes.name: Umayon Suspense Theater
episodes.overview: Nice Nature and Mejiro Ryan investigate an attack on Hayakawa Tazuna.

episodes.name: Today's Main Race! The Gilded Vessel Obstacle Course (G1)
episodes.overview: It's the final race of the season, as a group of horse girls take on a deviously designed obstacle course.
